room_title: Escape room "Behind Bars" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
room_description:
You are part of a local crime syndicate, and you have just been betrayed by one of your own. During last night’s poker game, Rocco was wearing a wire and signaled the police after ringleader John Carlo discussed details of the group’s latest heist. Thanks to Rocco, you’re now all in local lockup and will be shipped off to the state penitentiary tonight.
Your only chance to escape is now – while the warden is on his 60-minute break. In order to achieve success, no one can be left behind. All of you must break out of your cells and follow the clues to get to the outside world and freedom.
